trans-unit.source: Represents a single, named connection string in the connection strings configuration file section.
trans-unit.target: 表示連接字串的組態檔區段中的單一具名連接字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object represents a single entry in the `connectionStrings` configuration file section.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>物件都代表單一項目中`connectionStrings`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object at a given index in a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何存取<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>物件中的指定索引處<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider to use with the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 要與連接字串一起使用的提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object and add it to a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>物件，並將它加入至<xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The string value assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ConnectionString" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指派給 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ConnectionString" /> 屬性的字串值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ConnectionString%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The string value assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指派給 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.Name" /> 屬性的字串值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.Name%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供者名稱屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ProviderName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ProviderName" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings.ProviderName%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的字串表示。
